title: Defiance
description: I can't get enough of her, I never, ever will. The minute I see her face and the moment I hear her laugh, I'm liberated from all the hate and pain and drama. The horror just vanishes and I'm finally free. Maya is the only thing that will ever matter to me. Ever. She's all mine.He shouldn't have touched her. He shouldn't have pushed me. He will pay for it.
author: Ember Chase
